greeting_question.text: Good morning! How are you doing today?

animal_proverb.text: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

space_news.text: NASA launches a new satellite to study Earth's atmosphere.

cooking_instruction.text: To bake a cake, preheat the oven to 350°F and mix flour, sugar, and eggs.
